name: WordPress Author Plugin Widget
author: Themefantasy

sections.description:
WordPress Author plugin widget displays a list of WordPress authors on your WordPress website using the widget area section

Live Pro Demo | Demo

Showcase the Blog authors with a fun new look to attract the visitors.

As the name suggests, WordPress Author plugin widget displays a list of authors on your website using the widget area section.

This plugin has a simple user interface to display author information in the sidebar. All you have to do is drag the author widget into the sidebar and the plugin will do the needful.

What you can do with this plugin

Features

Some of the feature are available online in pro version.

  • Showcase blog authors in a fun way to attract new visitors
  • Display a list of authors in the sidebar or on the page
  • Unique ranking competition among authors
  • Responsive across all platforms and compatible on all browsers
  • Upload profile images and social media icons to author profile
  • Add different effects for a dynamic profile picture (rotate, fade, flip, flash)
  • Can be displayed using simple shortcodes/ a simple shortcode

For more information visit: http://themefantasy.com/plugin/wordpress-author-plugin-widget/
Watch Video
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CeJGGeSDWIY&feature=youtu.be

Current version 1.6

A brief Markdown Example for WordPress Author plugin widget

Free version is sufficient for normal design and if you are looking to change the layout then go to premium version.

  1. http://themefantasy.com/plugin/wordpress-author-plugin-widget/

Looking for more functionality then visit our site for supports.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload authorprofile.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the widget sections to show the profiles author.
sections.faq:
How can I display in the sidebar?

After activating the WordPress Author plugin widge, you will see “Author plugin” in WordPress Widget section.

Drag the widget into the required sidebar.

You can customize the setting fields how you want display.

Do I need to have coding skills to use WordPress Author plugin widget?

No. You don’t need any coding skill.

Can I display this in the pages using shortcode

No. Its only available in premium version of this plugin. Click here: https://codecanyon.net/item/a-fancy-wordpress-author-list/6135589

How can I get support if the WordPress Author plugin widget is not working?

If you face any problem with our WordPress Author plugin widget or something is not working feel free to get in touch with us using our website.

We will help you as soon as possible.

Do you Like this Plugin and want to encourage us for improvement?

Please give the plugin 5 Star rating and your precious appreciation will help us to make it much great in future.

Thank you!
